name: Enumerator
otherNightReminder: Tell the Enumerator how many of his guesses are part of evil bluffs.
ability: Each day you may publicly name 3 good characters. If you do, tonight you learn how many are part of evil bluffs.

jinxes.reason: If the Enumerator guesses and dies by execution, tonight the living Cannibal learns how many the Enumerator got correct.
The character the Marionette sees also counts as an evil bluff.
At least one Legion has Bluffs.
